    • Method Detail

      • insertUser

        public java.lang.String insertUser(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String email,
                                   java.lang.String password,
                                   java.lang.String question,
                                   java.lang.String answer,
                                   java.lang.String telephone)
        Web service operation Create a new customer entry if username does not already exist
        Parameters:
        username - users unique identification,min 3 - max 20 characters
        email - email address
        password - log in password
        question - Gets asked incase user forgets their password.
        answer - Must be answered correctly in order to change password.
        telephone - contact number
        Returns:
        String value "inserted" if username does not exist else null.

      • login

        public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String user,
                              java.lang.String passWd)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Web service operation, Get all user information where username and password match.
        Parameters:
        user - users unique login name.
        passWd - login password
        Returns:
        String containing all users details.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - interruption

      • SecretQuestion

        public java.lang.String SecretQuestion(java.lang.String usersname)
        Web service operation, Retrieve secret question where users name matches.
        Parameters:
        usersname - users unique account name.
        Returns:
        String with secret question.

      • passwordChange

        public java.lang.String passwordChange(java.lang.String usename,
                                       java.lang.String answer,
                                       java.lang.String newPassword)
        Web service operation, change users password if secret question is correct.
        Parameters:
        usename - users unique login name.
        answer - answer to secret question.
        newPassword - new password to login to web site.
        Returns:
        String "notSame" if answer is incorrect else null.

      • product

        public java.lang.String product(java.lang.String productName,
                                java.lang.String description,
                                java.lang.String productPrice,
                                java.lang.String seller,
                                java.lang.String dateEnd)
        Web service operation, insert a new product into database table products.
        Parameters:
        productName - //items name
        description - //short description of the item.
        productPrice - //price of the item
        seller - //who is the seller of the item.
        dateEnd - //closing date for the auction.
        Returns:
        String value, not used.

      • updateUser

        public java.lang.String updateUser(java.lang.String user,
                                   java.lang.String pass,
                                   java.lang.String mail,
                                   java.lang.String quest,
                                   java.lang.String questAnswer,
                                   java.lang.String userTel)
        Web service operation, Change users account details.
        Parameters:
        user - users unique login name.
        pass - password used to login.
        mail - email address
        quest - question to ask incase of forgotten password.
        questAnswer - answer to secret question.
        userTel - contact number.
        Returns:
        String users name.

      • products

        public java.lang.String products(java.lang.String items)
        Web service operation, retrieve a list of products to display as available for auctioning.
        Parameters:
        items - initiate product retrieval
        Returns:
        String of product id's and product names.

      • productDetails

        public java.lang.String productDetails(java.lang.String itemID)
        Web service operation, Retrieve product details to display when an item is selected.
        Parameters:
        itemID - the products unique identity value.
        Returns:
        String containing all items details.

      • bidMade

        public java.lang.String bidMade(java.lang.String biddersName,
                                java.lang.String productID,
                                java.lang.String bidValue)
        Web service operation, Save product bid information into database and log file.
        Parameters:
        biddersName - users unique login name.
        productID - unique identity value.
        bidValue - amount that has been bided.
        Returns:
        String with bids information, not used.
